summary: Impact focuses on creating meaningful change and positive outcomes in the workplace. It emphasizes the importance of purposeful actions that lead to significant results. This concept is closely tied to transforming work into an engaging adventure, as seen in the Play To Work approach. By defining purpose, creating a playful environment, and experimenting fearlessly, individuals and teams can maximize their impact. The idea encourages tracking progress, fostering team growth, and turning work into a collaborative journey of continuous improvement and achievement.
excerpt: Play To Work transforms your job into an engaging adventure. Start by defining your purpose, create a playful environment, and experiment fearlessly. Track progress like a game, boost motivation, and grow together as a team. Turn work into a fun, collaborative journey.
